*div1 type="summary"* *p*Certain property belongs to his wife and is not subject to execution.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*notice*/p*
*p*Deeming it to be the duty of every *person_mentioned*man */person_mentioned*to deal with perfect Candour with his fellow *person_mentioned*Citizens */person_mentioned*as regards his pecuniary situation, and also as an act of justice to my *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned* to prevent them from being improperly harrassed by the presecution of unjust claims against the *person_mentioned*property */person_mentioned*brought by them to this *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* I have Considered it to be my duty to give public notice that the *person_mentioned*Negroes*/person_mentioned* and property brought by myself and *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned* to this *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*, are actually and bona fide the *person_mentioned*property */person_mentioned*of my *person_mentioned*Wife*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Children*/person_mentioned*, being in part the dotal *person_mentioned*estate of my Wife*/person_mentioned* given to her by her *person_mentioned*parents*/person_mentioned* and brought into the Marriage as her own individual *person_mentioned*property*/person_mentioned*, and the balance is to make up for such parts of my *person_mentioned*Wife*/person_mentioned*s said dotal *person_mentioned*estate*/person_mentioned* as had been used and disposed of by me and was conveyed to my said *person_mentioned*Wife*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*children*/person_mentioned* by a regular deed of trust bearing date *date_mentioned n="12-20-1820">20 december 1820*/date_mentioned* and which deed is on record *location_mentioned*in the office of the *person_mentioned*Parish Judge of Rapide*/person_mentioned* in Louisiana*/location_mentioned*, and also in the *location_mentioned*Office of *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin Judge of this Colony*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned*, therefore no Claims whatever against me can in any manner have any liens on or against said *person_mentioned*property */person_mentioned*or its proceeds, this notice is given to prevent any *person_mentioned*person */person_mentioned*from being deceived by purchasing Claims from the *location_mentioned*United States*/location_mentioned* on me, for a part of those Claims are unjust, every just claim however on me shall be paid As soon as circumstances will admit, but the *person_mentioned*property */person_mentioned*itself or its—proceeds Can not be taken for any Claims whatever against me for the reasons above stated. *location_mentioned*Sn felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-11-1826">11th January 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Alexr Calvit*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Executed before me *person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin Judge of this *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* [rubric]*/p*
*p*The above notice was posted up at the Town of *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* on this day *date_mentioned n="01-11-1826">January 11—1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* Judge [Rubric]*/p*
